mapper.insert: insert into crm_customer_info (customer_id, full_name, short_name, manager_name, manager_phone, inner_customer, customer_type, address, us_plat_system, platform_admin_user, using_status) values (#{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usPlatSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformAdminUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select customer_id, full_name, short_name, manager_name, manager_phone, inner_customer, customer_type, address, us_plat_system, platform_admin_user, using_status from crm_customer_info
